name: PIX #381
description:
PIX #381
We are two! but we count as one! We have been created by wallet : tz1LvXYUNqq5w1ouMxSLQhDamorGJYmLjzvi!
Some $EVIL token (Evil Coin) has been sacrificed to power us up. The sacrificed amount is approximately 0 $EVIL!
Some $DARK token (Dark Evil Coin) has been sacrificed to power us up. The sacrificed amount is approximately 0 $DARK!
We have been created from PIX engine version: v0 - beta
